summary: International terrorists get a surprise when their cargo turns out to contain living dinosaurs. The army commando team now have to think fast, if they want to prevent the extinction of the human species, instead of the reptiles.
cast: Scott Valentine|Janet Gunn|Rick Dean|Anthony Peck|Rodger Halston|Terri J. Vaughn|Billy Burnette|Morgan Englund|Stephen Lee|Justina Vail|Cyril O'Reilly|Abraham Gordon|Michael McDonald|David Roberson|Jonathan Winfrey|Jason Brawley|Rodman Flender|Rob Camilletti|Slade Barnett|Bob McFarland|Brian Hayes Currie|Paul Darrigo|Lynell Forestall|Jon Kuyper|Jack Kyle
title: Carnosaurios III Especie mortal
